name: The Lost City (itch) (samuelspeichert)
description:
In this cooperative 4-player top-down game, your goal is to gather materials to repair the broken submarine, and escape the lost city! Collect the artifacts and defeat the monsters in four different levels, with 4 different characters with several abilities!

Credits :

GabbyAnn - Programmer, Sprite/Background Artist

Natanael Gagnon - Programmer, Shader Artist

samuelspeichert - Programmer

vbn578 - Programmer

Alinoë Schneider - Composer 

Special thanks to GabbyAnn, who made the sprites of the game : https://www.deviantart.com/gabbyann/about#badges_activity
